A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Daisy Ridley\, John Boyega\, Mark Hamill\, Adam Driver\, Andy Serkis\, Domnhall Gleeson\, Carrie Fisher and the rest of the cast was excellent. Star Wars The Last Jedi was extremely entertaining\, action-packed\, and funny. It was just as good as The Force Awakens. Good job Rian Johnson !!!!!!!! 8/10
